name: add random URI

func:
msg.payload = "Amount of NFT(s): " + msg.payload
return msg;

name: Enumerate Account Nr.
Info
info: This flow provides a playground to test all implemented ERC-721 Functions. Make sure to mint some NFTs before trying the functions!
